Do you want to help create the future of healthcare? Our name, Siemens Healthineers, was selected to honor our people who dedicate their energy and passion to this cause. It reflects their pioneering spirit combined with our long history of engineering in the ever-evolving healthcare industry.

We offer you a flexible and dynamic environment with opportunities to go beyond your comfort zone in order to grow personally and professionally. Sound interesting?

Then come and join our global team as Central and Eastern Europe POC Product Specialist & Business Development Professional

Your tasks and responsibilities:

Performs long range strategic planning and analysis and prepares summaries, and/or performs operational activities enabling the exploitation of (vertical and product) markets.

Manages product(s), solution(s) and/or service(s) assigned with full responsibility for the results, including definition of their customer and market requirements, growth & profit strategies, business planning, road mapping.

Performs project coordination in assigned projects and supplies information for the development of new strategies.

Completes market and business research as well as competitor analysis.

Performs analysis of strategic business segments, evaluates opportunities for new or existing Siemens Healthineers products in new markets, channels or customer target groups. Defines product marketing strategies (product/solution/service, price, placement, promotion).

Ensures the implementation of function related strategies, policies, and guidelines and/or manages operational activities enabling the exploitation of (vertical and product) markets.

Guides and ensures the implementation and/or administration of Business Development policies, guidelines, programs, and standards in assigned organizational unit(s).

Provides and reviews consolidated business forecasts.

Collects portfolio requirements across the regional sales force.

Contributes to various projects with a strategic perspective.

Manages market and business research programs.

Analyzes and evaluates potential business partner (mainly distributor or reseller) candidates, in cooperation with the responsible partner manager.

Develops cooperation with potential partners with various roles other than product distribution (such as pharma companies).

Liaises with various government bodies that influence respective POC markets and develops projects and business ideas.

Generates business leads and helps sales and business partners develop opportunities that lead to revenue.

To find out more about the specific business, have a look at https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/products-services

Your qualifications and experience:

Experience in point-of-care diagnostics market knowledge as well as product / solution portfolio.

General IT tools knowledge (MS Office and other standard SW) ‚Äì experienced

English language (professional proficiency), German, French and other CEE language skills are an advantage.

Technical, sales or customer experience is an advantage.

Project experience as well as leadership skills are an advantage.

Willingness to travel (est. up to 25% of time)

Basic business administration and medical knowledge

Our global team:
Siemens Healthineers is a leading global medical technology company. 66,000 dedicated colleagues in over 70 countries are driven to shape the future of healthcare. An estimated 5 million patients across the globe benefit every day from our innovative technologies and services in the areas of diagnostic and therapeutic imaging, laboratory diagnostics and molecular medicine, as well as digital health and enterprise services.

Our culture:
Our culture embraces different perspectives, open debate, and the will to challenge convention. Change is a constant aspect of our work. We aspire to lead the change in our industry rather than just react to it. That‚Äôs why we invite you to take on new challenges, test your ideas, and celebrate success.
Check our Careers Site at https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/de/careers
As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from individuals with disabilities.

What else do I need to know?

The gross annual salary according to the collective agreement for this position is at least ‚Ç¨ 50 000 (applies to Austria only). Depending on education and experience, overpayment is possible.
